member.name: T:BookPubDB.Model.Cover
member.summary: Represents the cover of a book, including its design ideas, associated artists, and whether it's digital-only.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Cover.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the cover.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Cover.DesignIdeas
member.summary: Gets or sets the design ideas for the cover.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Cover.DigitalOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the cover is digital-only.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Cover.Artists
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of artists associated with the cover.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Cover.Book
member.summary: Gets or sets the book that the cover is associated with.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Cover.BookId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the book associated with the cover.
